newsitem.title: USA: Marathon says finds oil in Green Canyon.
newsitem.headline: Marathon says finds oil in Green Canyon.

text.p: Marathon Oil Company said Thursday that it discovered oil in the Green Canyon block in the Gulf of Mexico.

"The Green Canyon 112 No. 1 discovery well was drilled to 20,422 feet, encountering 70 feet of net oil pay in two reservoirs. Fluid samples obtained indicate a high quality crude," Marathon said in a statement.
Marathon has a 65 percent working interest in the block; partner Shell Deepwater Development Inc. has 35 percent.

The discovery well, operated by Marathon, lies nine miles east of Shell's Green Canyon Block 65 Bullwinkle platform and six miles north of Marathon/Shell/BP's Troika subsea development project on Green Canyon Block 200.
